title: Dogfighting Arrests Since Michael Vick's Indictment, USA, 2007
name: Dogfighting Arrests Since Michael Vick's Indictment, USA, 2007
description: According to The Humane Society, Media reports since the day Michael Vick was indicted on dogfighting charges show that law enforcement is increasingly cracking down on dogfighters."This dataset shows the 25 arrests made between 7.18.07 and 8.20.07. It includes information on number of dogs seized,  number of dogs found dead,  and number of people arrested. More details are included in the description attribute.
